attributes.action: petition penalty fines for non attendance in school when the system fails my child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have a 10 year old child whom will not go to school. He is obviously afraid of something or has undermining problems. we have asked for help from social services, ewo's yisp, doctors but now my husband and i have a penalty fine each to pay if my son does not attend school for 15 consecutive days. I work in a school myself and i provide my son with work. i have been told he cannot do his sats as he is not in school. 
why is it left to my family to go through hell. stop this outrage and make the services do something for my neglected child. he is neglected by the system not the parents.
